products.name: Dust Cartridges
products.shortDescription: High-efficiency dust filtration cartridges designed for industrial applications.
products.fullDescription: Our premium dust cartridges provide superior filtration performance for demanding industrial environments. Engineered with advanced materials including gauze, gabardine, and solid concrete layers, these cartridges deliver exceptional dust capture efficiency while maintaining optimal airflow. Perfect for manufacturing facilities, workshops, and heavy-duty applications.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: Advanced multi-layer filtration system featuring gauze, gabardine, and solid concrete construction. Designed for maximum dust capture efficiency and extended service life in demanding industrial environments.

products.name: Pleated Dust Filters
products.shortDescription: Space-saving pleated design for enhanced filtration surface area.
products.fullDescription: Our pleated dust filters maximize filtration efficiency through an innovative folded design that increases surface area while maintaining a compact footprint. Ideal for applications requiring high dust capture rates with minimal pressure drop.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: Pleated design with reinforced media for extended service life. Optimized pleat spacing ensures consistent airflow and maximum dust loading capacity.

products.name: Bag Filters
products.shortDescription: Heavy-duty bag filters for large-scale dust collection systems.
products.fullDescription: Industrial-strength bag filters designed for high-volume dust collection applications. These durable filters provide reliable performance in the most challenging environments, with easy maintenance and long service intervals.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: Robust bag construction with reinforced seams and secure mounting systems. Available in various materials to suit different applications and temperature ranges.

products.name: Activated Carbon Water Filters
products.shortDescription: Premium activated carbon filters for superior water purification.
products.fullDescription: Our activated carbon water filters effectively remove chlorine, odors, taste, and organic contaminants from water. Using high-grade activated carbon with exceptional adsorption capacity, these filters ensure clean, fresh-tasting water for residential and commercial applications.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: High-performance activated carbon media with excellent adsorption characteristics. NSF certified materials ensure safe and effective water treatment.

products.name: Sediment Water Filters
products.shortDescription: Multi-stage sediment filtration for clean, particle-free water.
products.fullDescription: Protect your water systems and appliances with our high-quality sediment filters. Designed to remove sand, silt, rust, and other particulate matter, these filters provide essential pre-filtration for your water treatment system.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: Graded density filtration media captures particles from coarse to fine. Available in various micron ratings to match specific application requirements.

products.name: Reverse Osmosis Systems
products.shortDescription: Advanced RO systems for ultra-pure water filtration.
products.fullDescription: Experience the highest level of water purification with our reverse osmosis systems. These comprehensive filtration systems remove up to 99% of contaminants including heavy metals, fluoride, and dissolved solids, delivering ultra-pure drinking water.

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.description: Complete multi-stage filtration system with high-efficiency RO membrane. Includes pre-filters, RO membrane, and post-filters for comprehensive water treatment.
